snippet.title: Incident In Oakwood Trailer
snippet.description:
Incident In Oakwood - Alien Abduction Horror - OUT NOW! https://azagamestudio.itch.io/incident-in-oakwood

An urban explorer ventures out to an abandoned cabin in the woods that was involved in an unsolved alien abduction case from the 1960s. UFO activity and sightings of extraterrestrial  beings have been reported in the area of Oakwood forest dating back all the way to the 1950s.

Features

    Realistic solo urban exploration simulation feeling
    Use your B/W camera mode to unveil secrets unseen to the naked eye.
    Sepia camera mode
    Limited camera blitz mechanic
    Photorealistic graphics and VHS Found Footage theme
    Realistic audio design
    Multiple endings - 2 different possible endings 
    Randomized audio design system and event system
    Randomized scare system 

Created by Aza Game Studio.
https://twitter.com/AzaGameStudio
